typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Ref_Data_ID as integer,
		Ref_Table as string,
		Ref_Field as string,
		Reference_Code as string,
		Reference_Code_Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("select max([Ref_Data_ID]) as maxkey from dbo.REF_Data"),
	format: 'query') ~> MAXSURGTKEY
